channel.title: Flipping clan
channel.description:
Wassup, i've decided to make a flipping clan On runescape, i don't know if this is a good idea or not, but i'm simply Making this clan to help people that do not know how to flip, and that need tips on flipping. i've only just made this clan, has about 5 people in atm, Which Are flipping.
Soon If/when the clan chat gets big, i will be changing it into A merching clan Cc.
In the Clan chat, there is a new flipping item out Every day. You need about 150k+ To start this.
The Clan chat name is "to get bum" come join if you want to start flipping, or need help ect.

item.title: Flipping clan
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:18, topic:405273”][quote author=Eh Pretty Easy link=topic=502266.msg3674636#msg3674636 date=1311176351]

Buy death runes 2gp under normal.
Sell at normal

If u have like 300k, it’s only a 2k profit.
If u have 3m, it’s a solid 20k profit.

You can get about 10-20 flips an hour, depending on if you’re world hopping and your attention span.
[/quote]That’s terrible, not to mention that all runes have a maximum limit of 25,000 (the amount which you can buy every 4 hours), meaning that a 2gp flip would give you a 50K profit in 4 hours.

You can extend the limit, I currently buy and sell 300k deaths at once, going up by 100k everyday.[/quote]
How do you do that o.o

Read full topic

item.title: Flipping clan
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

I usually flip barrows armor for good cash, i buy like 30 Torag tops (under limit which is 50 i believe) for way cheap, then sell overnight for a good 3-4m profit every morning

Read full topic

item.title: Flipping clan
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:3, topic:405273”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=502266.msg3674628#msg3674628 date=1311176009]
Buy death runes 2gp under normal.
Sell at normal

If u have like 300k, it’s only a 2k profit.
If u have 3m, it’s a solid 20k profit.

You can get about 10-20 flips an hour, depending on if you’re world hopping and your attention span.
[/quote]That’s terrible, not to mention that all runes have a maximum limit of 25,000 (the amount which you can buy every 4 hours), meaning that a 2gp flip would give you a 50K profit in 4 hours.[/quote]
You can extend the limit, I currently buy and sell 300k deaths at once, going up by 100k everyday.

Read full topic

item.title: Flipping clan
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:7, topic:405273”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=502266.msg3674642#msg3674642 date=1311176767]

[quote author=Eh Pretty Easy link=topic=502266.msg3674636#msg3674636 date=1311176351]

Buy death runes 2gp under normal.
Sell at normal

If u have like 300k, it’s only a 2k profit.
If u have 3m, it’s a solid 20k profit.

You can get about 10-20 flips an hour, depending on if you’re world hopping and your attention span.
[/quote]That’s terrible, not to mention that all runes have a maximum limit of 25,000 (the amount which you can buy every 4 hours), meaning that a 2gp flip would give you a 50K profit in 4 hours.

10,000 death runes = 2.8m

And when you sell them, the limit resets.
So you could buy 25,000 for 7m. Then sell them for the 50k profit, which would instantly reset once you’ve made the sale.
[/quote]Pretty sure the limit does not reset?[/quote]
It does. I would know.

Lets say buying 10k death runes puts u at -10k. U still have 15k before you’re at 0, where u can’t buy anymore. However, when u sell 10k death runes, u get +10k, putting u back at 25k.

Read full topic

item.title: Flipping clan
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

xryz:

i wouldnt mind doing flipping as long as im not losing money. i mean i could flip while im training through superheat. but joining this clan will teach me how to flip correct?

Correct.
